title: Connections Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves loose teas, salads, soups and pastries with some vegan items. Takes reservations. Accommodates large groups. Menu changes and is posted on fb page. You walk into the restaurant and go directly into the kitchen where they will show you what is available for the day and you give them your order. Casual, quaint atmosphere. Located inside an old house, which goes along with the style of the town.
